content: I'm excited to try all these unique foods, and I don't have any dietary restrictions that would prevent me from trying them. I'm actually looking forward to being adventurous and stepping out of my comfort zone when it comes to food. One thing I'm a bit concerned about is the language barrier, though. I don't speak Japanese, and I'm worried that I might have trouble communicating with restaurant staff or vendors. Do you have any tips on how to navigate that situation?
